Students’ motivation to use technology for learning

Kahveci M, Coskun S, Taylan RD. (2008). World Conference on Educational Multimedia, Hypermedia and Telecommunications (ED-MEDIA).
Citation

Kahveci M, Coskun S, & Taylan RD. (2008). Students’ motivation to use technology for learning. Paper presented at the World Conference on Educational Multimedia, Hypermedia and Telecommunications (ED-MEDIA). Vienna, Austria. June 30 - July 4, 2008.
